products.title: Vitra Blackout Ash Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout ash grey fabric is a chic mid grey colour, it's cool and contemporary and will work beautifully within the home or office. Ash grey is bold enough to be used as a statement shade within your interior styling. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: Do you have trouble sleeping with nighttime lights and summertime sun? The rimini (blackout) range is specially designed to shield against harsh glares and unwanted light for a good night's sleep or day's relaxation, and this simple white edition does it with refined and classy style. Whilst the white will provide a refreshing lift to any surrounding, try balancing with a soothing lemon or muted lime walls for energising colour contrast.

products.title: Splash Tropez Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tropez has an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which provides extra peace of mind that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
